testcase.name: Successfully receiving the limited company customer's payment application via the link and keeping the reference record
testcase.system-out: Given I open browser for and go to the Paytr production website loaded successfully for all scenarios.passed Then Control of 12 subheadings of the Everything You Need for Payments heading.passed Then Control of 5 subheadings of the Mainpage...............................passed Then I see product option and choose the payment type.......................passed Then I check the payment via link page loaded successfully..................passed Then I take screenshot and save as "payment_via_link_page"..................passed Then I fill main first informations areas about company and choose businesstype.passed Then I take screenshot and save as "first_areas_filled_from_Excel"..........passed Then I accept the terms and send apply......................................passed Then I fill main second informations areas about company and choose businesstype.passed Then I take screenshot and save as "second_areas_filled_from_Excel".........passed Then I send apply for last time.............................................passed Then I see successfully apply and save the reference number.................passed Then I take screenshot and save as "successfully_applied"...................passed
